text: "Hey, Soul Sister" is a hit song under the musical group Train. The single was released in August 11, 2009 as the lead single on Train's fifth studio album Save Me, San Francisco. This song peaked at number 3 on Billboard Hot 100 and is Train's highest and its most commercially successful song, though the single was not eligible for any Grammy Award in the General Field. Category:2009 songs Category:Train songs
title: Hey, Soul Sister
